scripts.build:ui: yarn build:ui-scss && ng build ui && mkdir -p dist/ui/assets && cp -r projects/ui/assets/main.css dist/ui/assets/main.css && cp -r projects/ui/assets/bootstrap.min.css dist/ui/assets/bootstrap.min.css
scripts.publish:packages: npm run publish:core && npm run publish:ui
scripts.publish:core: cp README.md dist/core/README.md && cd dist/core && npm publish
scripts.publish:ui: cp README.md dist/ui/README.md && cd dist/ui && npm publish
scripts.sync:core: yarn build:core && rm -rf node_modules/@ngx-performance-core/core && mv dist/core node_modules/@ngx-performance-core/core
scripts.sync:ui: yarn build:ui && rm -rf node_modules/@ngx-performance-ui/ui && mv dist/core node_modules/@ngx-performance-ui/ui
scripts.link:core: cd projects/core && yarn link && cd ../../node_modules/@ngx-performance-ui && mv core core.tmp && yarn link @ngx-performance-ui/core
scripts.link:ui: cd projects/ui && yarn link && cd ../../node_modules/@ngx-performance-ui && mv ui ui.tmp && yarn link @ngx-performance-ui/ui
scripts.unlink:core: cd node_modules/@ngx-performance-ui && yarn unlink @ngx-performance-ui/core && mv core.tmp core && cd ../../projects/core && yarn unlink
scripts.unlink:ui: cd node_modules/@ngx-performance-ui && yarn unlink @ngx-performance-ui/ui && mv ui.tmp ui && cd ../../projects/ui && yarn unlink
